deckofcards

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • deckofcards.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    A deck is a group of cards that can be used to play a game. Cards are drawn from the top of the deck and inserted in the bottom

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int card_count 
      (package private) java.util.LinkedList<Card> deck
      This class implements a standard 52 card deck, used in most casino games.
      private static char[] ranks 
      private static int[] scores 
      private static char[] suits 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      This constructor creates a default deck with 52 cards
      Deck(java.lang.String[] cards)
      This constructor creates a deck of cards with the given cards.

    • Field Detail

      • deck

        java.util.LinkedList<Card> deck
        This class implements a standard 52 card deck, used in most casino games. It uses a Linked List to present the Deck in which the nodes are of Class cards.
        Suits Hearts, Spades, Diamonds, Clubs
        Rank23456789TJQKA
        Score234567891011121314

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        This constructor creates a default deck with 52 cards

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.lang.String[] cards)
     throws InvalidCardException
        This constructor creates a deck of cards with the given cards.
        The cards must be given in an array of strings. As an example: AS 5S 8H - Ace of Spades, 5 of Spades and 8 of Hearts
        Parameters:
        cards -
        Throws:
        InvalidCardException

    • Method Detail

      • rankToScore

        public int rankToScore(char rank)
        This method returns the score value of a given rank
        Parameters:
        rank - rank to be evaluated
        Returns:
        score score corresponding to the given rank

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        This method shuffles the deck randomly

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
              throws EmptyDeckEception
        This method takes a card from the deck to draw it. This card is returned.
        Returns:
        card card to be drawn
        Throws:
        EmptyDeckEception - exception thrown when there are no more cards in the deck
        See Also:
        deckofcards.Card.java

      • collectCard

        public void collectCard(Card card)
        This method's purpose is to return a dealt card to the deck. This card is given in argument
        Parameters:
        card - card to be returned to the deck
